sentences.en: An oil spill could be devastating for wildlife.
sentences.cn: 溢出的油对野生动物来说可能是毁灭性的。

sentences.en: Don't spill water on your suit.
sentences.cn: 不要把水洒到你的衣服上。

sentences.en: He carefully balanced the satchel so that its contents would not spill out onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 他仔细地把小背包放好，不让里面的东西掉到地板上。

sentences.en: He is prepared to spill the blood of a million people.
He was tempted to spill out his problems to Philip.
sentences.cn: 他很想把自己的问题透露给菲利普。
凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

sentences.en: Look out the milk doesn't spill.
sentences.cn: 当心不要让牛奶溢出来.

sentences.en: Tears began to spill out of the boy's eyes.
sentences.cn: 男孩的眼泪开始夺眶而出。

sentences.en: The coffee is so full that it might spill over.
sentences.cn: 咖啡太满可能会溢出来.

sentences.en: The oil spill has caused incalculable damage to the environment.
sentences.cn: 这次石油泄漏对环境造成了难以估计的损害。

sentences.en: The spill could wipe out the Gulf's turtle population.
sentences.cn: 这次原油泄漏可能会使波斯湾的海龟灭绝。

sentences.en: The sway of the pail caused some milk to spill out.
sentences.cn: 桶一晃荡,泼出来一些牛奶.

sentences.en: The tanker began to spill its cargo of oil.
Tyson broke a rib when he took a spill on his motorcycle.
sentences.cn: 泰森从摩托车上摔下来，断了一根肋骨。

sentences.en: Utmost care must be taken not to spill any of the contents.
sentences.cn: 千万注意里面的东西一点都不能洒出来。

sentences.en: When the bell rings, more than 1,000 children spill from classrooms.
sentences.cn: 当铃声响起时，1,000多名孩子从教室里涌了出来。

words.tran_cn: 溢出，溅出；溢出量；摔下；小塞子

phrases.tran_cn: 化学溢出物；化学品溢漏
(非正式)无保留地透露大量信息，和盘托出
（使）溢出，（使）溅出；突然涌出；说出（真相、内情）
(非正式)无意中（或不慎）泄露秘密

trans.tran_en: when you spill something, or an amount of something that is spilled
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
